Index Updaters¶

class ceda_elasticsearch_tools.core.index_updaters.IndexUpdaterBase(index, host, port)¶

Base class for index updaters. Contains common methods.

class ceda_elasticsearch_tools.core.index_updaters.CedaDirs(index, host, port)¶

Class to aide in updating and managing the ceda-dirs index

update_title()¶

MOLES title has been changed. Update titles for all records matching url

Returns:Status code
update_path()¶

MOLES record path has been changed. Update directories to have correct information.

Returns:Status code
update_dataset()¶

A new dataset has been created in MOLES. Add dataset information to relevant directories

Returns:Status code
update_collection()¶

A new collection has been created in MOLES. Add collection information to relevant directories

Returns:Status code
add_dirs(directories)¶

New directories have been added to the archive. Add directories to directories index

Parameters:directories – List of dictionary items containing information to be processed in request. Path key is required. eg. [{“path”: “/neodc/sentinel1b/data/IW/L1_SLC/IPF_v2/2018/09, “record_type”: “Dataset”}, …]
Returns:Status - Success|Failed
delete_dirs(directories)¶

Directories have been deleted from the archive. Remove directories from the index.

Parameters:directories – List of dictionary items containing information to be processed in request. Path key is required. eg. [{“path”: “/neodc/sentinel1b/data/IW/L1_SLC/IPF_v2/2018/09”}, …]
Returns:Status - Success|Failed
